author: TravisEz13
body:
There is additional issue, is what email should we use on this tag
This was brought up in #3462

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: `powershellteam@hotmail.com` is a valid email address, although I'm not sure if anyone really monitors it (I certainly don't).  Having an individual's email who isn't actively maintaining the image seems incorrect.

title: Update docker files and replace `MAINTAINER` tag with `LABEL maintainer`
